name: Alice Smith

recipes.cooking_method: Stir-fry chicken with peanuts, chili peppers, soy sauce, and rice vinegar until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is thick and sticky.
Cook rice and scramble eggs in a wok, add vegetables, soy sauce, and oil, and stir-fry until everything is heated through and well combined.
Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, soy sauce, and sesame oil, wrap the mixture in dumpling wrappers, and steam or fry until cooked through.

bio: Alice is a classically trained chef who has worked in some of the finest restaurants in Europe. She specializes in French cuisine and is known for her exquisite pastry-making skills.

bio: Bob is a self-taught chef who has gained a following on social media for his creative fusion dishes. He loves experimenting with different flavors and textures to create dishes that are both delicious and visually stunning.
